item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes of Aspose.Words for JasperReports 24.1. Important Note: Starting from release 1.9.0 there are several versions of JAR library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperServer and JasperReports): For JasperServer For JasperReports Use the following JAR library 7.8.0 … 8.0.0 6.12.0… 6.20.0 aspose.words.jasperreports-24.1.0-7.8.0-8.0.0.jar 7.1.0 … 7.5.0 6.5.0 … 6.11.0 aspose.words.jasperreports-24.1.0-7.1.0-7.5.0.jar 6.4.2 … 6.
